H0.text: Speed keeps the Moon orbiting around Earth.

H1.text: Gravity keeps the Moon orbiting around Earth.

H2.text: Weight is what keeps the Moon orbiting around Earth.

H3.text: Friction keeps the Moon orbiting around Earth.

A4.text: Gravity is the law that every object with mass attracts every other object in the universe in proportion to each mass and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.

A5.text: Planets orbit the Sun in an ellipse as a consequence of the law of gravity.
